articles.author: Jordyn Grzelewski
articles.title: Ford debuts redesigned 2024 Ranger pickup for North America - Detroit News
articles.description: Orders will open later this month for the 2024 Ford Ranger pickup, which is assembled at Michigan Assembly Plant in Wayne.
articles.content:
Ford Motor Co. on Wednesday debuted a redesigned version of its globally-popular midsize pickup truck, the Ranger, for model year 2024 including the high-performance Raptor model.

articles.title: Twin blasts from Sun hit Earth, cause radio blackout over North America, Pacific Ocean - India Today
articles.description: The geomagnetic storm caused minor disturbances but the effect was felt at low altitudes as well.
